extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:100% !important; height:44px; position: fixed; top:0;} #site-translate-header-wrapper p{font-size:10px;line-height: 12px;}#site-translate-message{display:table-cell; height:44px; vertical-align:middle; width:5000px;} *{ word-break: normal; word-wrap: break-word; } #header { margin: 55px auto 0; } .slicknav_menu {top: 44px;} ul#tab-head li:lang(en) { font-size: 12px; } .cloum4 .box_season_event ul li:lang(en), .cloum4 ul li strong:lang(en), .cloum3 ul li strong:lang(en) { text-align: left; } @media (max-width: 1120px) { #site-translate-header-wrapper p{ text-align:left; padding: 1%;}} @media screen and (max-width: 560px){ #top_news_box { width: 90%; margin: 0 auto;} #footer { padding: 5%; } #copyright { width: 96%; text-align: left; padding: 1%;}}
